Uses of Class
cbccore.movement.plugins.MovementPlugin

Packages that use MovementPlugin
cbccore.movement A plug-in based movement library for navigating yourself around the board, with little more code than simply:
driveTrainObject.moveCm(5., driveTrainObject.getMaxCmps() * .5);
